meta_title: What is Downtime? Definition, Types, and Industrial Impact
meta_description: Downtime is the duration an asset is offline or unproductive. Understand the difference between planned and unplanned downtime to improve OEE and reliability.
title: What is Downtime?

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What is Downtime?

image_prompt: A wide-angle, high-definition photo of a clean, modern automated manufacturing floor. In the foreground, a diverse pair of maintenance engineers in high-visibility vests and hard hats are looking at a tablet together near a large industrial robotic arm. The background shows a complex assembly line with soft bokeh. The lighting is bright and professional, conveying a sense of high-tech efficiency and proactive industrial care. No text or overlays.
